description:
A talk with Kikuchi helps Tomozaki realize what he really wants, and a confrontation with Hinami sets the course for the future of their relationship.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Equipment for Girls Has Special Effects
Heroine ni Shika Soubi Dekinai Item ni wa Tokubetsu na Kouka ga Aru
ヒロインにしか装備できないアイテムには特別な効果がある
